public final class Instagram.Direct extends Object
This class includes all the methods related to chat and messaging.

    • seeMessage

      @NotNull public @NotNull com.xcoder.tasks.AsyncTask<Void> seeMessage(@NotNull @NotNull String username)
      Marks message as seen that was sent by the username.
      Parameters:

    • getChatMessages

      public com.xcoder.tasks.AsyncTask<List<String>> getChatMessages(@NotNull @NotNull String username, int howMany, @Nullable @Nullable OnProgressListener listener)
      Retrieve messages from a particular chat from last till number specified.
      Parameters:
      howMany - The number of messages to get. (including recipient chat). 0 for all
      username - The user to get the message from.
      listener - A listener for tracking progress. only works when count > 20
      Returns:
      A AsyncTask holding list of messages.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if howMany is negative.

    • getChatMessagesFrom

      public com.xcoder.tasks.AsyncTask<List<String>> getChatMessagesFrom(@NotNull @NotNull String username, @NotNull @NotNull String fromMessage, int frequency)
      Retrieve messages from a particular chat from a particular message till last.
      Parameters:
      username - The user to get the message from.
      fromMessage - The message from where to start fetching messages. This is case-sensitive
      frequency - If 'fromMessage' is occurred multiple time, then pass the no. from where to consider. For example, To retrieve messages from 'hey' and if there are 3 more same messages (exact equal) like 'hey' then pass 1 to get from last 'hey' or 2 or 3 from the top second or first 'hey'.
      Returns:
      A AsyncTask holding list of messages.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if frequency is negative.

    • groupMessage

      @NotNull public @NotNull com.xcoder.tasks.AsyncTask<Void> groupMessage(@NotNull @NotNull String message, @NotNull @NotNull String adminUsername)
      Broadcast a text message in a direct chat group.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to broadcast.
      adminUsername - The username of any one admin of the group. If the same user is admin of 2 or more group then the top first group will be selected.
      Returns:
      A AsyncTask indication success or failure of the request

    • spamDM

      public void spamDM(@NotNull @NotNull String username, int count, @NotNull @NotNull String[] messages, @NotNull @NotNull OnMessageActionCallback callback)
      Send mass messages to a user at a single time (also called spamming)
      Parameters:
      count - The no. of message to sent
      messages - list of String containing messages to sent. a random message picked will be sent from this list.
      callback - Callback indication success and failure of each message.

    • spamGroup

      public void spamGroup(int count, @NotNull @NotNull String adminUsername, @NotNull @NotNull String[] messages, @NotNull @NotNull OnMessageActionCallback callback)
      Send mass messages to a group at a single time (also called spamming)
      Parameters:
      count - The no. of message to sent
      adminUsername - Username of admin of the group. If this user is also admin of another group, then the Top first group in your inbox will be considered.
      messages - list of String containing messages to sent. a random message picked will be sent from this list.
      callback - Callback indication success and failure of each message.

    • deleteMessages

      public void deleteMessages(@NotNull @NotNull String username, int howMany, @NotNull @NotNull OnMessageActionCallback callback)
      Deletes the messages from the last till the particular number.
      Parameters:
      username - The user to to delete messages from.
      howMany - The no. of messages (including recipient message) to delete. For example, if there are last 2 message from him/her and then 3 messages from you, so you have to pass 5 here to delete your 3 messages. Pass 0 to delete all.
      callback - The callback indication success or failure of each delete message request.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if howMany is negative.

    • deleteMessagesFrom

      public void deleteMessagesFrom(@NotNull @NotNull String username, @NotNull @NotNull String fromMessage, int frequency, @Nullable @Nullable OnMessageActionCallback callback)
      Starts deleting the messages from the exact 'message' that was sent bu you.
      Parameters:
      username - The user to to delete messages from.
      fromMessage - The message to start deleting from.
      frequency - if the 'fromMessage' occurred more then 1 time, pass the number from where to consider. Otherwise pass 0.
      callback - The callback indication success,failure and progress of the operation.

    • attachNotificationListener

      public void attachNotificationListener(@NotNull @NotNull OnNotificationListener listener)
      Starts listening for new messages.
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener to call when new messages are received.

    • detectNotificationListener

      public void detectNotificationListener()
      Stops listening for new messages.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the listener was never attached.
